subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Kings took a 2-1 lead in the Western Conference finals against the Chicago Blackhawks, the defending Stanley Cup champions, with a 4-3 win in Game 3 at Staples Center.
snippet: The Los Angeles Kings took a 2-1 lead in the Western Conference finals against the Chicago Blackhawks, the defending Stanley Cup champions, with a 4-3 win in Game 3 at Staples Center.
